title: Helvetica III
content:
[Interesting](http://web.archive.org/web/20111222000948/http:/www.creativereview.co.uk/cr-blog/2010/february/deskg)...

"Hustwit is currently working on his third film in his design film trilogy, although wonâ€™t at this stage be drawn on its subject matter"

I wonder what the subject might be?
author: Sii Daniels

comments.content: Fonts... Industrial Design... perhaps UI Design? That would be cool. Or fashion, interior design, furniture - not so much - no thanks! :-)

\>Probably the iPad.

Using the right magnification filters he could reuse the iPhone movie.
